Have been working as a User Interface Designer since 2004 am presently sub-contracting with <nowiki>[[http://deyalexander.com.au/|Dey Alexander Consulting]]</nowiki>.  Am a member of <nowiki>[[http://chisig.org/|CHISIG]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://luv.asn.au/|Linux Users of Victoria]]</nowiki>, <nowiki>[[http://wanau.org/|Web Accessibility Network of Australian Universities (WANAU)]]</nowiki> and the <nowiki>[[http://openusability.org/|OpenUsability project]]</nowiki>.  In 2005 I help set up the <nowiki>[[http://luv.asn.au/sigs/edusig/|EduSIG]]</nowiki> group to act as a network for people interested in promoting the use and development of free software within Victorian educational institutes.
